segments.content: This Week In React #112: Astro, Radix, Remix, Next.js, MDX, Storybook, Expo 46, Skia, TanStack, TC39, Docusaurus...
segments.sourceMdx: This Week In React #112: Astro, Radix, Remix, Next.js, MDX, Storybook, Expo 46, Skia, TanStack, TC39, Docusaurus...

segments.content: Hi everyone!
segments.sourceMdx: Hi everyone!
segments.translated_content: 大家好！

segments.content: Looks like a lot of devs are already on vacation 😎. On my side I will also skip some editions this summer to rest.
segments.sourceMdx: Looks like a lot of devs are already on vacation 😎. On my side I will also skip some editions this summer to rest.
segments.translated_content: 看起来许多开发者已经开始休假了😎。今年夏天我也会暂停几期推送稍作休息。

segments.content: This week, we have a good variety of React and React-Native content. A lot of very positive feedback from the community on [Bun](https://bun.sh/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)!
segments.sourceMdx: This week, we have a good variety of React and React-Native content. A lot of very positive feedback from the community on [Bun](https://bun.sh/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)!
segments.translated_content: 本周我们准备了丰富的React和React-Native内容。社区对[Bun](https://bun.sh/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)的反响非常热烈！

segments.content: On my side, [Docusaurus](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) 2.0 should be released soon, after 4 years of alpha/beta. I hope you will help me to make the launch a success! I'm thinking of sending you a different email for the occasion, to better present this tool I'm working on for Facebook.
segments.sourceMdx: On my side, [Docusaurus](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) 2.0 should be released soon, after 4 years of alpha/beta. I hope you will help me to make the launch a success! I'm thinking of sending you a different email for the occasion, to better present this tool I'm working on for Facebook.
segments.translated_content: 我这边，[Docusaurus](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) 2.0经过4年的alpha/beta测试后即将发布。希望大家能助力这次发布取得成功！我考虑为此单独发送一封邮件，更好地介绍这个我为Facebook开发的项目。

segments.content: ## React
segments.sourceMdx: ## React
segments.translated_content: ## React相关

segments.content: [**Statements Vs. Expressions**](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/javascript/statements-vs-expressions/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**Statements Vs. Expressions**](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/javascript/statements-vs-expressions/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**语句与表达式**](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/javascript/statements-vs-expressions/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: Josh Comeau is preparing his next course on React. He proposes to go back to the basics of JavaScript, and thus allow a better understanding of how JSX works, which only works with expressions. On the same topic, I would love to see the [do-expressions](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-do-expressions?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) proposal progress 😇.
segments.sourceMdx: Josh Comeau is preparing his next course on React. He proposes to go back to the basics of JavaScript, and thus allow a better understanding of how JSX works, which only works with expressions. On the same topic, I would love to see the [do-expressions](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-do-expressions?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) proposal progress 😇.
segments.translated_content: Josh Comeau正在筹备他的React新课程。他建议回归JavaScript基础，从而更好地理解JSX的工作原理——它只能处理表达式。关于这个话题，我期待[do-expressions](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-do-expressions?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)提案能取得进展😇。

segments.content: [**How to build connected components in Storybook**](https://storybook.js.org/blog/how-to-build-connected-components-in-storybook/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**How to build connected components in Storybook**](https://storybook.js.org/blog/how-to-build-connected-components-in-storybook/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**如何在Storybook中构建关联组件**](https://storybook.js.org/blog/how-to-build-connected-components-in-storybook/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: An official Storybook article that explains well all you can do with decorators: add a layout, global providers, mock a Redux store or requests... It can help to add "connected" components to your Storybook that otherwise can't be rendered due to context dependencies.
segments.sourceMdx: An official Storybook article that explains well all you can do with decorators: add a layout, global providers, mock a Redux store or requests... It can help to add "connected" components to your Storybook that otherwise can't be rendered due to context dependencies.
segments.translated_content: Storybook官方文章详细讲解了装饰器的各种用法：添加布局、全局Provider、模拟Redux store或请求...这能帮助你在Storybook中添加原本因上下文依赖而无法渲染的"关联"组件。

segments.content: [**How I Estimate NPM Package Market Share (and how Redux usage compares to other libraries)**](https://blog.isquaredsoftware.com/2022/07/npm-package-market-share-estimates/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**How I Estimate NPM Package Market Share (and how Redux usage compares to other libraries)**](https://blog.isquaredsoftware.com/2022/07/npm-package-market-share-estimates/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**如何估算NPM包市场份额（以及Redux与其他库的对比）**](https://blog.isquaredsoftware.com/2022/07/npm-package-market-share-estimates/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: Mark Erikson (Redux) explains how he analyzes npm package usage trends, based on various more or less reliable tools. Download stats are often related to CI builds. He uses React state managers as an example. He now estimates Redux / React usage at 33% (previously 45-50%)
segments.sourceMdx: Mark Erikson (Redux) explains how he analyzes npm package usage trends, based on various more or less reliable tools. Download stats are often related to CI builds. He uses React state managers as an example. He now estimates Redux / React usage at 33% (previously 45-50%)
segments.translated_content: Mark Erikson（Redux）解析了他分析npm包使用趋势的方法，基于各种可靠性不等的工具。下载量数据常与CI构建相关。他以React状态管理器为例，现在估计Redux/React使用率为33%（此前为45-50%）。

segments.content: [**Actionless and Stateless Reducers in React**](https://julesblom.com/writing/actionless-and-stateless-reducers?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**Actionless and Stateless Reducers in React**](https://julesblom.com/writing/actionless-and-stateless-reducers?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**React中的无动作与无状态Reducer**](https://julesblom.com/writing/actionless-and-stateless-reducers?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: useReducer() is not reserved for complex cases: it can also be used for very simple state machines, like changing a boolean from false to true.
segments.sourceMdx: useReducer() is not reserved for complex cases: it can also be used for very simple state machines, like changing a boolean from false to true.
segments.translated_content: useReducer() 并非仅适用于复杂场景：它同样可以用于非常简单的状态机，比如将布尔值从 false 切换为 true。

segments.content: **Extras:**
segments.sourceMdx: **Extras:**
segments.translated_content: **扩展阅读：**

segments.content:
- 📜 [Next.js: open external links in a New Tab](https://www.seancdavis.com/posts/open-external-nextlink-links-in-a-new-tab/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): it can be interesting to create your own Link abstraction on top of the underlying framework to add extra behavior
- 📜 [The Unlocked Possibilities of the :has() Selector](https://blog.jim-nielsen.com/2022/unlocked-possibilities-of-has-selector/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): CSS feature. Interesting comparison with React rendering at the end.
- 📜 [Atomic Forms in React](https://reaper.is/writing/20220709-atomic-forms?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): presents a bit Jotai-Form and the difference with more traditional approaches like Formik.
- 📜 [Create a simple cookie with Remix](https://jonmeyers.io/blog/create-a-simple-cookie-with-remix?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): shows that the use of cookie in Remix is relatively simple, and close to the HTTP protocol
- 📜 [Yelp - Migrating from Styleguidist to Storybook](https://engineeringblog.yelp.com/2022/07/migrating-from-styleguidist-to-storybook.html?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📜 [Fresh: The Next-Gen JavaScript Web Framework](https://hxrsh.in/blog/fresh?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📜 [Rendering long lists using virtualization with React](https://wanago.io/2022/06/27/long-lists-react-virtualization/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📜 [Component Code Coverage in Cypress v10](https://glebbahmutov.com/blog/component-code-coverage/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🧑‍🎨 [Remix + Bun demo](https://twitter.com/ebey_jacob/status/1544608334736592896?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🧑‍🎨 [React-on-the-edge](https://github.com/vercel-labs/react-on-the-edge?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): Vercel demo that shows how to use React SSR (without Next.js) with the Edge Runtime. With or without streaming.
- 🐦 [Remix loader type inference](https://twitter.com/kentcdodds/status/1545048020663750661?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): PR merged to facilitate typesafe usage of the useLoaderData() hook 👌
- 🐦 [Bun + React SSR](https://twitter.com/jarredsumner/status/1544580094328418304?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): significant performance gains
- 📦 [RemixBlocks](https://javascript.plainenglish.io/remixblocks-ready-to-use-remix-tailwind-css-routes-and-ui-blocks-470a6db70915?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): I find the idea interesting: nested routes Remix are full-stack which makes them a good candidate for copy/paste, quite similar to Tailwind.
- 📦 [react-obsidian](https://github.com/wix-incubator/react-obsidian?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): dependency injection for React
- 📦 [remix-bossa-nova-stack](https://github.com/clerkinc/remix-bossa-nova-stack?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📦 [Preact 10.9](https://github.com/preactjs/preact/releases/tag/10.9.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📦 [Next.js 12.2.1](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/releases/tag/v12.2.1?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📣 [Vercel: Hydrogen can now be deployed with 0 config](https://vercel.com/changelog/hydrogen-projects-can-now-be-deployed-with-zero-configuration?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

- 📜 [Atomic Forms in React](https://reaper.is/writing/20220709-atomic-forms?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): presents a bit Jotai-Form and the difference with more traditional approaches like Formik.
- 📜 [Create a simple cookie with Remix](https://jonmeyers.io/blog/create-a-simple-cookie-with-remix?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): shows that the use of cookie in Remix is relatively simple, and close to the HTTP protocol

- 📜 [Rendering long lists using virtualization with React](https://wanago.io/2022/06/27/long-lists-react-virtualization/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📜 [Component Code Coverage in Cypress v10](https://glebbahmutov.com/blog/component-code-coverage/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🧑‍🎨 [Remix + Bun demo](https://twitter.com/ebey_jacob/status/1544608334736592896?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🧑‍🎨 [React-on-the-edge](https://github.com/vercel-labs/react-on-the-edge?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): Vercel demo that shows how to use React SSR (without Next.js) with the Edge Runtime. With or without streaming.

- 🐦 [Bun + React SSR](https://twitter.com/jarredsumner/status/1544580094328418304?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): significant performance gains
- 📦 [RemixBlocks](https://javascript.plainenglish.io/remixblocks-ready-to-use-remix-tailwind-css-routes-and-ui-blocks-470a6db70915?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): I find the idea interesting: nested routes Remix are full-stack which makes them a good candidate for copy/paste, quite similar to Tailwind.
- 📦 [react-obsidian](https://github.com/wix-incubator/react-obsidian?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): dependency injection for React

- 📦 [Preact 10.9](https://github.com/preactjs/preact/releases/tag/10.9.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.translated_content:
- 📜 [Next.js：在新标签页中打开外部链接](https://www.seancdavis.com/posts/open-external-nextlink-links-in-a-new-tab/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：在底层框架之上创建自己的Link抽象以添加额外行为可能很有价值
- 📜 [`:has()`选择器解锁的可能性](https://blog.jim-nielsen.com/2022/unlocked-possibilities-of-has-selector/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：CSS特性。文末与React渲染的对比很有趣。
- 📜 [React中的原子化表单](https://reaper.is/writing/20220709-atomic-forms?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：介绍Jotai-Form及其与传统方案（如Formik）的差异。
- 📜 [用Remix创建简单cookie](https://jonmeyers.io/blog/create-a-simple-cookie-with-remix?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：展示Remix中cookie的使用贴近HTTP协议且简单直接
- 📜 [Yelp - 从Styleguidist迁移到Storybook](https://engineeringblog.yelp.com/2022/07/migrating-from-styleguidist-to-storybook.html?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📜 [Fresh：下一代JavaScript Web框架](https://hxrsh.in/blog/fresh?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📜 [使用React虚拟化技术渲染长列表](https://wanago.io/2022/06/27/long-lists-react-virtualization/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📜 [Cypress v10中的组件代码覆盖率](https://glebbahmutov.com/blog/component-code-coverage/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🧑‍🎨 [Remix + Bun演示](https://twitter.com/ebey_jacob/status/1544608334736592896?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🧑‍🎨 [React-on-the-edge](https://github.com/vercel-labs/react-on-the-edge?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：Vercel演示如何在Edge Runtime中使用React SSR（无需Next.js），支持流式与非流式渲染。
- 🐦 [Remix loader类型推断](https://twitter.com/kentcdodds/status/1545048020663750661?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：PR已合并，优化useLoaderData()钩子的类型安全使用👌
- 🐦 [Bun + React SSR](https://twitter.com/jarredsumner/status/1544580094328418304?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：显著性能提升
- 📦 [RemixBlocks](https://javascript.plainenglish.io/remixblocks-ready-to-use-remix-tailwind-css-routes-and-ui-blocks-470a6db70915?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：嵌套路由的Remix是全栈方案，使其成为类似Tailwind的可复制粘贴模板
- 📦 [react-obsidian](https://github.com/wix-incubator/react-obsidian?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：React的依赖注入方案
- 📦 [remix-bossa-nova-stack](https://github.com/clerkinc/remix-bossa-nova-stack?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📦 [Preact 10.9](https://github.com/preactjs/preact/releases/tag/10.9.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📦 [Next.js 12.2.1](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/releases/tag/v12.2.1?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📣 [Vercel：Hydrogen现支持零配置部署](https://vercel.com/changelog/hydrogen-projects-can-now-be-deployed-with-zero-configuration?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.sourceMdx: 💡 [How to sponsor this newsletter](https://thisweekinreact.com/sponsor)

segments.content: [**Storetasker: Freelance Shopify Devs network**](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact\&utm_source=thisweekinreact)
segments.sourceMdx: [**Storetasker: Freelance Shopify Devs network**](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact)
segments.translated_content: [**Storetasker：Shopify开发者自由职业者网络**](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact)

segments.content: Hey! This is Tim from Storetasker. We run the best Shopify dev freelance network. I would love for you to apply if you enjoy building Shopify sites or are excited about leveraging Shopify's **cutting-edge React framework** for building custom storefronts: [**Hydrogen**](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter).
segments.sourceMdx: Hey! This is Tim from Storetasker. We run the best Shopify dev freelance network. I would love for you to apply if you enjoy building Shopify sites or are excited about leveraging Shopify's **cutting-edge React framework** for building custom storefronts: [**Hydrogen**](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter).
segments.translated_content: 大家好！我是Storetasker的Tim。我们运营着最优秀的Shopify开发者自由职业者网络。如果您喜欢构建Shopify网站，或对利用Shopify的**前沿React框架**构建定制商店前端感到兴奋，欢迎您申请加入：[**Hydrogen**](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)。

segments.content: Accepted devs on the network work on a freelance basis, and we present them with great opportunities to work on some of the best Shopify brands (Alo Yoga, Chubbies, JUDY & many many more).
segments.sourceMdx: Accepted devs on the network work on a freelance basis, and we present them with great opportunities to work on some of the best Shopify brands (Alo Yoga, Chubbies, JUDY & many many more).
segments.translated_content: 通过审核的开发者将以自由职业者身份加入网络，我们将为他们提供与顶级Shopify品牌（如Alo Yoga、Chubbies、JUDY等）合作的绝佳机会。

segments.content: The great thing about Storetasker is that devs aren't in competition with each other - they just pick up the jobs that match their interests. Beyond that - it's a very tight-knit community.
segments.sourceMdx: The great thing about Storetasker is that devs aren't in competition with each other - they just pick up the jobs that match their interests. Beyond that - it's a very tight-knit community.
segments.translated_content: Storetasker的独特之处在于开发者之间无需竞争——只需选择符合自己兴趣的任务即可。此外，这里还是一个非常紧密的社区。

segments.content: Feel free to apply directly via this [link](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact\&utm_source=thisweekinreact) to join.
segments.sourceMdx: Feel free to apply directly via this [link](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact) to join.
segments.translated_content: 欢迎直接通过此[链接](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact)申请加入。

segments.content: [**TechTree - Introducing This Week in React Bounty Board**](https://techtree.dev/t/sHBrozirH3xSY8jP3M7gGv?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**TechTree - Introducing This Week in React Bounty Board**](https://techtree.dev/t/sHBrozirH3xSY8jP3M7gGv?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**TechTree - 推出本周React悬赏板**](https://techtree.dev/t/sHBrozirH3xSY8jP3M7gGv?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: TechTree is building the first **social-economic platform for developers** - a place to help you unlock the real value of your knowledge and network!
segments.sourceMdx: TechTree is building the first **social-economic platform for developers** - a place to help you unlock the real value of your knowledge and network!
segments.translated_content: TechTree正在打造首个**开发者社会经济平台**——一个帮助您释放知识和网络真正价值的地方！

segments.content: The first major feature on TechTree is Bounties, a tool to help you **earn money by referring your friends** to open roles at top VC backed tech startups or find a job that might be right for you!
segments.sourceMdx: The first major feature on TechTree is Bounties, a tool to help you **earn money by referring your friends** to open roles at top VC backed tech startups or find a job that might be right for you!
segments.translated_content: TechTree的首个主要功能是悬赏系统，这个工具可以帮助您**通过推荐朋友**到顶级风投支持的科技初创公司开放职位来赚钱，或找到适合您的工作！

segments.content: To help show you around, I have gone ahead and created my very own Bounty board - **a selection of remote, React related roles for you to apply to or refer your network to**. There has been over $300k worth of Bounties claimed on TechTree so far!
segments.sourceMdx: To help show you around, I have gone ahead and created my very own Bounty board - **a selection of remote, React related roles for you to apply to or refer your network to**. There has been over $300k worth of Bounties claimed on TechTree so far!
segments.translated_content: 为了帮助您了解，我创建了自己的悬赏板——**精选远程React相关职位供您申请或推荐给您的网络**。截至目前，TechTree上已兑现超过30万美元的悬赏！

segments.content: Looking to hire React developers? You can post Bounties of your own to be featured on my Bounty board! Read more and get started [here](https://www.notion.so/techtreedev/Share-your-jobs-on-my-Bounty-board-c51d2d97d9f3421bab103c42097907ae?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter).
segments.sourceMdx: Looking to hire React developers? You can post Bounties of your own to be featured on my Bounty board! Read more and get started [here](https://www.notion.so/techtreedev/Share-your-jobs-on-my-Bounty-board-c51d2d97d9f3421bab103c42097907ae?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter).
segments.translated_content: 正在招聘React开发者？您可以发布自己的悬赏，并有机会出现在我的悬赏板上！了解更多并开始[点击这里](https://www.notion.so/techtreedev/Share-your-jobs-on-my-Bounty-board-c51d2d97d9f3421bab103c42097907ae?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)。

segments.content: ## React-Native
segments.sourceMdx: ## React-Native
segments.translated_content: ## React-Native

segments.content:
* 📜 [Expo: sunsetting the CLI Web UI](https://blog.expo.dev/sunsetting-the-web-ui-for-expo-cli-ab12936d2206?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): the CLI web UI will disappear. Not a big deal, it was limited anyway compared to the CLI features.
* 🧑‍🎨 [useAnimatedSentor travel cards parallax](https://twitter.com/lima_lucas3/status/1545956814650499072?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): demo with a very nice visual result 😎
* 📦 [react-native-keyboard-controller 1.0](https://github.com/kirillzyusko/react-native-keyboard-controller?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): synchronizes keyboard visibility with animated values 👌
* 📦 [vision-camera-plugin-builder](https://twitter.com/mrousavy/status/1544982270997852160?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): reduces the boilerplate for the creation of a vision camera plugin.
* 📦 [React-Native MacOS 0.68](https://twitter.com/ReactNativeMSFT/status/1545289039187611650?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
* 🎥 [It's After Effects, but in Remotion](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter\&v=-7MOoWN2_nk): William Candillon shows how React-Native-Skia runs on the web with Remotion. You can follow and apply the After Effect tutorials, not written for us at first.
* 📊 [FlatList vs FlashList profiling](https://twitter.com/almouro/status/1544669919479996416?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
* 🐦 [Reanimated now supports V8](https://twitter.com/swmansion/status/1546872761045229568?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
* 🐦 [Expo EAS + App Store Connect v2](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1546760343405330434?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
* 🐦 [BottomSheet + FlashList integration](https://twitter.com/gorhom/status/1546256656639614977?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

- 🎥 [用Remotion实现After Effects效果](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter&v=-7MOoWN2_nk)：William Candillon展示React-Native-Skia在Remotion中的Web端运行，可套用原生为AE设计的教程
